name: excel-etl-fullstack
description: Excel ETL application with React frontend and Node.js backend

scripts.start: npm install --prefix backend && npm start --prefix backend
scripts.start:backend: cd backend && npm run build && node --enable-source-maps dist/src/server.js
scripts.build: npm install --prefix backend --include=dev && npm run build --prefix backend
scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.postinstall: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
